mapper.select: select d.s_code code, course, grade, d.sex sex, dept.name dept, d.name name, collage.name collage from student d join (select b.stu_id code, c.c_name course, b.grade grade from (select id, cou_id from teach_cou where id = #{teaId}) a join stu_grade b on b.teach_cou_id = a.id join course c on c.id = a.cou_id) f on d.id = f.code join dept on dept.id = d.id join collage on dept.col_id = collage.id;
mapper.update: update stu_grade set grade = #{grade} where teach_cou_id = (select id from teach_cou where cou_id = (select id from course where c_name = #{cName}) and tea_id = #{teaId}) and stu_id = (select id from student where s_code = #{code});
